\Aura\CliOption

Defines a single command-line option.

Methods

__construct()

__construct(string $name, string $long, string $short, string $param, bool $multi, string $default) : void

Initialized the object with an option definition array.

Parameters

string $name

The option property name.
string $long

The long form of the option flag.
string $short

The short form of the option flag.
string $param

Whether a param is required, optional, or rejected.
bool $multi

Can the option be specified multiple times?
string $default

The default value of the option param.
